description.full: Disney Fantasia:Music Evolved is the award-winning musical motion video game from the developer of the smash-hits Rock Band and Dance Central. Experience the best artist line-up ever assembled for a music game, from Mozart to Bruno Mars, Jimi Hendrix to Lady Gaga, Queen to Lorde & Imagine Dragons. Download the Demo Now!
description.short: Disney Fantasia:Music Evolved is the award-winning musical motion video game from the developer of the smash-hits Rock Band and Dance Central. Experience the best artist line-up ever assembled for a music game, from Mozart to Bruno Mars, Jimi Hendrix to Lady Gaga, Queen to Lorde & Imagine Dragons. Download the Demo Now!
